definitions.definition: The flat , roundish bone in the knee .
A metal cover trim that fits over a panel rib after it has been cut and bent .
A cap or strong covering for the knees , used chiefly for horses , to protect their knees in case of a fall .

main_definition: ( anatomy ) The flat , roundish bone in the knee .
secondary_definitions: ( roofing ) A metal cover trim that fits over a panel rib after it has been cut and bent .
A cap or strong covering for the knees , used chiefly for horses , to protect their knees in case of a fall .
